desc: 4 Our Ears is the Official Grado Store, and the place to find all Grado Labs headphones, phono cartridges, and genuine accessories at unbeatable prices. Free domestic shipping on all headphones. Full USA warranty.

layout.text: Introducing the first true wireless earphone by Grado

From electronic to jazz, the GT220 will not disappoint. The 8mm dynamic drivers deliver rich accurate bass, detailed midrange and clear, precise treble.

Grado’s GT220 offers Bluetooth 5.0, Apt-x and AAC compatibility. A battery life of 6 Hours with an additional 5 full charges stored in the case for a total charge of up to 36 hours. The storage/charging case offers Qi compatible wireless charging as well as USB-C charging. The design of the GT220 is comfortable so you can enjoy hours of listening. The sensible touch controls mean ease of use for listening and phone.
